name: The Cranston Dining Table
description: Be enamoured by the alluring grace of the stunning Cranston dining table, offering the ultimate in sophisticated dining. Inspired by the likes of Ã‰mile-Jacques Ruhlmann from the glamorous period of Art Deco in the 1930s and fused with a contemporary twist, this dining table will be the focal point of any stylish dining room. Made in Britain, the Cranston can be finished in any of DAVIDSON's beautiful timber finishes with a stunning radial pattern boasting an exceptional level of British craftsmanship with each individual veneer segments being hand laid with exquisite precision. The elegant shaped legs unite to the centre of the table with a distinguished smooth central disk in high gloss black lacquer, all standing on an angular facetted based offering the perfect geometrical harmony.
